body.p: The OASIS DITA specification (DITA 1.2 XHTML) provides a combination of ready-to-use and ready-to-specialize resources for building modular information systems in XML. The specification focuses on the building blocks and how they aggregate into larger structures. It does not capture any of the company-specific or product-specific logic that informs the many design decisions underlying a successful DITA implementation.

This community-sourced publication seeks to address some of that gap between mark-up logic (thoroughly documented in the DITA spec) and implementation design logic (typically specific to industries or particular companies). It addresses the most common design issues that teams must face when planning a new DITA implementation or DITA migration.
To review the most current contributions to this publication, see https://github.com/StanDoherty/infodesign.
